value.title: Call Center AI Market Growing at a CAGR 21.3% | Key Player IBM, Microsoft, Oracle, AWS, SAP
value.excerpt: The global Call Center AI Market size is to grow from USD 1.6 billion in 2022 to USD 4.1 billion by 2027, at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 21.3% during the forecast period.
